channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rampant DOJ Insurrection Should Lead To Massive Housecleaning, Especially In Virginia District
item.description: A spate of resignations, leaks, and refusals to prosecute clear-cut crimes out of the Eastern District of Virginia show that President Trump needs to ...

item.title: Jay Jones And Katie Porter Say The Quiet Part Out Loud
item.description: They don't believe you can be reasoned or compromised with, and they're telling you in writing and on camera that they're not interested in trying.

item.title: Colorado Is Still as Confused on Free Speech as It Is on Gender
item.description: The Supreme Court appears skeptical of laws restricting therapists from counseling against gender transitions.

item.title: We’re a Long Way from October 6
item.description: Israel is now the military hegemon in the region, and Hamas is a shadow of its former self.

item.title: Partisan shutdown spin twists facts and ignores inconvenient truths

item.title: To Fix the Deficit, Start with Bloated ‘Disability’ Programs
item.description: Cutting spending is always hard, so conservatives should focus on the least deserving recipients no matter what walk of life they are in.

item.title: The Anti-Democratic Streak of ‘Banned Books Week’

item.title: States are increasingly dependent on federal dollars and increasingly at the mercy of Washington
item.description: States are more dependent on the federal government than ever before, with Uncle Sam providing twice as much revenue as he did 35 years ago -- making ...

item.title: Trump signs Columbus Day proclamation
item.description: President Trump signed a proclamation Thursday honoring Italian explorer Christopher Columbus, who traveled to the New World in 1492.

item.title: Trump says live hostages will be freed next week
item.description: President Trump said the 20 live hostages will be released from Gaza early next week after Israel and Hamas agreed to the first phase of a peace plan.

item.title: Trump Should Use His Tariff Instincts to Lower Drug Prices
item.description: The president has an opportunity to pressure foreign leaders into delivering a fair prescription drug market for Americans.

item.title: Dems Rebelling Against Trump Resurrect Confederate Talking Points
item.description: Democrats are using arguments for states' rights as a cynical ploy to paint themselves as victims of an oppressive federal government.

item.title: The Atlantic Fantasizes About Military Treason Against Trump
item.description: These are not idle musings. It is dangerous to encourage trained and weaponized warfighters to turn on the commander and chief.
